description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=1/3. Annihilate hordes of undead weirdos, scavenge for supplies, rescue survivors, search for your lost friend and thwart an evil genius. All in a days work for Alice as she returns to exact another Zombie Shotgun Massacre!
description.short: Annihilate hordes of undead weirdos, scavenge for supplies, rescue survivors, search for your lost friend and thwart an evil genius. All in a days work for Alice as she returns to exact another Zombie Shotgun Massacre!
